entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 14 April 2023
